creator: hmf@gmx.de
text:
going from an ssl site to a non ssl site to a different virtual host doesn't work.
You will always be redirected to the major or main virtual host with a warning, 
that this site doesn't own that certifacate.
In the address field of the browser the 'wanted' virtual host's address is
displayed, while the content of the browsers (NS 7.01) window shows the 'main',
respectivly the first virtual host site.

creator: mads@apache.org
text:
Looks very much like a vhost configuration error.
With no more details, I'll mark this as INVALID.
